text: (İbn-i Arabi) Allah'ım, evlilik akdini mübarek eyle.
english: (Ibn Arabi) O Allah, bless this marriage contract .

text: Bu çiftler arasında geçim, sevgi, evliliklerinde sebat nasip eyle.
english: these couple harmony, love, and steadfastness in their marriage.
...create for these couples the same harmony, understanding, and love that existed between
Prophet Adam (peace be upon him) and
Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) and our mother Khadija, and

text: ...ve Hazreti Ali'yle Hazreti Fatma arasında var olan...

english: ... grant this couple righteous sons and daughters

text: ...uzun ömürler ve bol rızık ihsan eyle.
Rabbimiz, bize dünyada da, ahrette de iyilik, güzellik ve nimetler lütfeyle.
english: Our Lord, grant us goodness, beauty, and blessings in this world and in the hereafter.
And protect us from the torment of fire.
Once it's completely quiet, we'll hide the swords...
...under the tables tonight . By the time

text: Yarın Ertuğrul geldiğinde Ares gelip, işini bitirmiş olacak.
english: Ertuğrul arrives tomorrow, Ares will have come and finished the job.

text: Buraya her şeyi göze alarak geldik.
Ertuğrul şimdi kalede beyleriyle zaferi kutluyor.
english: Ertuğrul is now celebrating the victory with his lords in the castle .

text: Allah birliğinizi daim ede Artuk Bey.
english: God keep your unity strong, Artuk Bey. May God grant us

text: Tez vakitte yiğit evlatlar nasip ede.
Allah razı olsun beyim, sağ olasın.
english: God bless you, sir, thank you.

text: Artuk Bey, Allah, soyunuzu soylandırsın, boyunuzu boylandırsın.
english: Artuk Bey, may God increase the nobility of your lineage and your stature.

text: (Turgut) Rabbim sizi her türlü musibetten korusun inşallah.
english: (Turgut) May God protect you from all kinds of calamities, inshallah. Thank you so much,

text: Eksik olmayasın Turgut Alp, sağ olasın.
english: Turgut Alp, I appreciate it. May it bring
God grant you success, Mr. Artuk. May you become an
... and a tribe with your daughter, God willing.
Thank you, Hayme Hatun, much appreciated.

text: -(Halime) Allah mesut etsin Artuk Bey. -(Marya) Hayme Ana.
english: -(Halime) May God bless you, Artuk Bey. -(Marya) Hayme Ana.
(Artuk) May God be pleased with you, Halime Sultan.
Thanks to you, I experienced this happiness. Thank you

text: Allah mutluluğunuz daim etsin Artuk Bey.
english: God grant you lasting happiness, Mr. Artuk. Thank
you so much, Aslıhan Hatun. May you have only

text: Biricik biricik balaların olsun Artuk Bey.
english: one and only child, Mr. Artuk. May
it bring glory to our tribe.
Why are we waiting? Let's hug and celebrate.
